ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from selecting status "Application Submitted" if required fields are left empty.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "Grant" && ISPICKVAL( ampi__Project_Status__c , "Application Submitted") && ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( ampi__Project_Status__c ),"Application in Formulation") && ( ISBLANK( Planned_Total_Project_Budget_Donor__c ) || ISBLANK( Grant_Amount_Requested_From_Donor__c ) || ISBLANK( Exchange_Rate_For_Proposed_Budget__c ) )
